title: 3 and Out - CMC to SF, Kyler/Kliff TNF Drama, Belichick O, Eye-Roll Russ, Week 7 3 for the  $$$
itunes:title: 3 and Out - CMC to SF, Kyler/Kliff TNF Drama, Belichick O, Eye-Roll Russ, Week 7 3 for the  $$$
description:
John reacts to the Panthers trading Christian McCaffrey to the Niners for picks, and the Cardinals getting a TNF W over the declining Saints despite Kyler Muray and Kliff Kingsbury’s heated sideline argument. He also discusses Bill Belichick’s offense hitting stride despite his heavily criticized move naming Matt Patricia OC, why the Denver version of Russell Wilson is faker than ever, and if the end of Baker Mayfield’s NFL career is around the corner. Finally, he runs 3 Week 7 NFL games by Action Network sharp Stuckey to see if there's professional agreement or disagreement on this week’s picks! 

Subscribe NOW and follow Middlekauff and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content. It's always FanDuel for the best wagering action! #volume #herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
